mapper.select: SELECT u.user_name, o.orders_name, o.orders_price, o.orders_qty, o.created_at FROM user_tb u LEFT JOIN orders_tb o ON u.user_id = o.user_id WHERE o.orders_qty > 0
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO orders_tb (orders_name, orders_price, orders_qty, product_id, user_id, created_at) VALUES(#{ordersDto.ordersName}, #{ordersDto.ordersPrice}, #{ordersDto.ordersQty}, #{ordersDto.productId}, #{userId}, NOW())
